response.original_title: 劇場版ポケットモンスター ベストウイッシュ 神速のゲノセクト ミュウツー覚醒
response.overview: A group of five Genesect have invaded the big city and pose a threat to the supply of electricity, which attracts the attention of the legendary Pokémon Mewtwo. Satoshi, Pikachu and his friends must come to the rescue when the powerful leader, a red Genesect, faces Mewtwo.
response.tagline: Beyond the limits. Where myth meets legend...
response.title: Pokémon the Movie: Genesect and the Legend Awakened
